players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now to protect the town."
Charlie: "Bob has been silent so far, which is suspicious, but Diana's accusation feels a bit rushed. We should discuss more before voting to avoid a mistake."
Diana: "Charlie, I understand your caution, but we only have one mafioso, and I have solid proof from last night. Delaying the vote risks losing more town members. Let's vote Bob out now."
Charlie: "Since Diana claims to have solid proof but hasn't shared it, I think she should explain her evidence before we rush to vote out Bob. Transparency will help us make the right choice."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
